thread.title: Trump Children Correct Comedian’s Tweet Mocking Pregnancy Announcement
thread.title_full: Trump Children Correct Comedian’s Tweet Mocking Pregnancy Announcement

author: Nick Bolger
title: Trump Children Correct Comedian’s Tweet Mocking Pregnancy Announcement
text:
Donald Trump Jr. and Eric Trump were both quick to correct a spelling error in comedian Chelsea Handler's Monday tweet about Eric and his wife Lara expecting a child. The baby will be Eric and Lara's first child, the Washington Examiner reported .
Handler tweeted Monday, "I guess one of [Donald Trump]'s sons is expecting a new baby. Just what we need. Another person with those jeans. Let's hope for a girl."
I guess one of @realDonaldTrump 's sons is expecting a new baby. Just what we need. Another person with those jeans. Let's hope for a girl.
— Chelsea Handler (@chelseahandler) March 20, 2017 

"Jeans??? I guess I'm not at all surprised… but really?!?! #genes," Trump Jr. tweeted, pointing out the spelling error.
Jeans??? I guess I'm not at all surprised… but really?!?! #genes https://t.co/fIUJwEtl8U 
— Donald Trump Jr. (@DonaldJTrumpJr) March 20, 2017 

Shortly after the expecting father responded to Handler adding, "‘Genes' #ItIsaBoy."
"Genes" #ItIsaBoy https://t.co/b76HnoLGZA 
— Eric Trump (@EricTrump) March 20, 2017 

President Donald Trump's second son Eric Trump announced his wife's pregnancy earlier via Twitter on Monday afternoon.
"[Lara Trump] & I are excited to announce that we are adding a boy to #TeamTrump in September. It's been an amazing year. We are blessed!" Trump tweeted.
. @LaraLeaTrump & I are excited to announce that we are adding a boy to #TeamTrump in September. It's been an amazing year. We are blessed! pic.twitter.com/ENrhdxdziA 
— Eric Trump (@EricTrump) March 20, 2017 

The post Trump Children Correct Comedian’s Tweet Mocking Pregnancy Announcement appeared first on Washington Free Beacon .
